articles.title: Are YOU oestrogen dominant? The 17 signs you have too much oestrogen - Express
articles.description: OESTROGEN is a female sex hormone that has essential roles in the body, from regulating the menstrual cycle and controlling puberty to forming bones and impacting the skin and hair. But, it's not good news when you have TOO much oestrogen.
